Continuous Monitoring: Continuously monitor the progress of the implemented initiatives. Use employee feedback, performance metrics, and cultural surveys to gauge the effectiveness of the changes.

Iterative Improvements: Based on feedback and results, make iterative improvements to the action plans. Identify what is working well and what needs adjustment, and refine strategies accordingly.

Leadership Feedback: Gather feedback from employees regarding leadership adherence to unity of purpose, consistent vision, and clarity of intent. Provide coaching and support to leaders who need improvement.
